languages.text: Культ Губительной жажды так и не смог оправиться от жуткой резни, устроенной на арене демонами. Лишившись своих Суккуб, он стал легкой мишенью, и вскоре, во время очередного представления, вся арена со зрителями погибла в результате внезапного и удивительно быстрого пространственного коллапса, отправившего вопящие души ксеносов прямо в пасть Той, Что Жаждет.

In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.
languages.original_text: Культ Губительной жажды так и не смог оправиться от жуткой резни, устроенной на арене демонами. Лишившись своих Суккуб, он стал легкой мишенью, и вскоре, во время очередного представления, вся арена со зрителями погибла в результате внезапного и удивительно быстрого пространственного коллапса, отправившего вопящие души ксеносов прямо в пасть Той, Что Жаждет.

traits.locale_text: In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its succubi, it became the easy target, and soon during another performance, the entire arena with the spectators, died in a sudden and weirdly rapid dimensional collapse. Screaming xenos souls were sent right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its succubi, it became the easy target, and soon during another performance, the entire arena with the spectators, died in a sudden and weirdly rapid dimensional collapse. Screaming xenos souls were sent right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

languages.text: 致命饥渴教派最终没能从竞技场的恶魔大屠杀中恢复过来。教派失去了所有的血腥魔女，变成了任人宰割的对象。没过多久，竞技场中突然出现了规模惊人的次元裂隙，整个竞技场和所有观众都命丧当场。那些异形的灵魂尖叫着，通通落入了饥渴女士的巨口之中。
languages.original_text: In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

traits.locale_text: 致命饥渴教派最终没能从竞技场的恶魔大屠杀中恢复过来。教派失去了所有的血腥魔女，变成了任人宰割的对象。没过多久，竞技场中突然出现了规模惊人的次元裂隙，整个竞技场和所有观众都命丧当场。那些异形的灵魂尖叫着，通通落入了饥渴女士的巨口之中。

languages.text: Letztlich erholte sich der Kult des Fatalen Dursts nicht von dem Blutbad der Dämonen in der Arena. Nachdem er alle seine Succubi verloren hatte, wurde er zu einem leichten Ziel. Bald darauf starb die gesamte Arena samt aller Zuschauer bei einem plötzlichen und überraschend schnellen Dimensionskollaps, der die schreienden Seelen der Xenos geradewegs in den Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, schickte.
languages.original_text: In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

traits.locale_text: Letztlich erholte sich der Kult des Fatalen Dursts nicht von dem Blutbad der Dämonen in der Arena. Nachdem er alle seine Succubi verloren hatte, wurde er zu einem leichten Ziel. Bald darauf starb die gesamte Arena samt aller Zuschauer bei einem plötzlichen und überraschend schnellen Dimensionskollaps, der die schreienden Seelen der Xenos geradewegs in den Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, schickte.

languages.text: Le Culte de la Soif Fatale ne parvint jamais à se relever du bain de sang qui avait eu lieu dans l'arène. Ses succubes ayant été éliminées, il devint une cible facile et toute l'arène ainsi que ses spectateurs disparurent dans un effondrement dimensionnel étonnamment soudain. Les âmes hurlantes des xénos furent immédiatement dévorées par l'Assoiffée.
languages.original_text: In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

traits.locale_text: Le Culte de la Soif Fatale ne parvint jamais à se relever du bain de sang qui avait eu lieu dans l'arène. Ses succubes ayant été éliminées, il devint une cible facile et toute l'arène ainsi que ses spectateurs disparurent dans un effondrement dimensionnel étonnamment soudain. Les âmes hurlantes des xénos furent immédiatement dévorées par l'Assoiffée.

languages.text: Al final, el Culto de la Sed Letal no se recuperó del baño de sangre de los daemons en la arena. Tras perder a todas sus súcubos, se convirtió en blanco fácil y, poco después, la arena al completo, espectadores incluidos, desapareció en un repentino y peculiarmente veloz colapso dimensional que envió las almas de los aterrados xenos directamente a las fauces de la Sedienta.
languages.original_text: In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

traits.locale_text: Al final, el Culto de la Sed Letal no se recuperó del baño de sangre de los daemons en la arena. Tras perder a todas sus súcubos, se convirtió en blanco fácil y, poco después, la arena al completo, espectadores incluidos, desapareció en un repentino y peculiarmente veloz colapso dimensional que envió las almas de los aterrados xenos directamente a las fauces de la Sedienta.

languages.text: 結局、「宿命の渇き」教団,は闘技場でのディーモンたちの大虐殺から立ち直ることはできなかった。すべてのサキュバスを失った後、彼らは容易な標的とった。やがて闘技場全体が観客とともに突然、驚くほど急速な次元崩壊によって死に絶え、悲鳴を上げる異種族の魂がかの渇きたる女の口へと送り込まれた。
languages.original_text: In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

traits.locale_text: 結局、「宿命の渇き」教団,は闘技場でのディーモンたちの大虐殺から立ち直ることはできなかった。すべてのサキュバスを失った後、彼らは容易な標的とった。やがて闘技場全体が観客とともに突然、驚くほど急速な次元崩壊によって死に絶え、悲鳴を上げる異種族の魂がかの渇きたる女の口へと送り込まれた。

languages.text: Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı, arenadaki iblis katliamı sonrasında kendini toparlamayı başaramadı. Tüm Sakkubuslarını kaybettikten sonra kolay hedef oldular. Kısa süre sonra da tüm arena, boyutsal bir çöküş nedeniyle tüm seyircilerle birlikte ani ve beklenmedik bir şekilde yok oldu. Çığlıklar atan zeno ruhları, doğrudan Susayan'ın ağzına düştü.
languages.original_text: In the end, the Cult of the Fatal Thirst did not recover from the daemons' bloodbath in the arena. After losing all of its Succubi, it became an easy target, and soon the entire arena, along with its spectators, died in a sudden and surprisingly rapid dimensional collapse, sending the screaming xenos souls right into the maw of She Who Thirsts.

traits.locale_text: Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı, arenadaki iblis katliamı sonrasında kendini toparlamayı başaramadı. Tüm Sakkubuslarını kaybettikten sonra kolay bir hedef hâline geldi ve kısa süre sonra tüm arena, seyircileriyle beraber ani ve beklenmedik bir boyutsal çöküş nedeniyle yok oldu. Çığlıklar içindeki zenoların ruhları, direkt olarak Susayan'ın ağzına doğru düştü.
